Html:
Hello,
I am currently trying to develop a kinect application using C# that can be used as a music player (or say as a piano).
Most of the tutorials I found online are developed using kinect for windows SDK beta version which is obviously a lot different from current version (v1.7).

I would like to create a 3D space of different musical keys where user can move around, and use left and right hands and feet to interact with these keys. Could you be able to provide me a tutorial with source code to develop such application please?

Thanks

Hi Gabriel,
     Did you get a chance to check out samples in 1.7 Toolkit "Control Basics-WPF".
This sample does no show how to play music files. But setting up your musical keys/Buttons should be really easy by modifying this sample.

Let me know if this is the type of interaction you are looking for.

Thank you,
Ashok.
